tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Lingual Orthodontics,Re-Root Canal Treatment,Laser Gum Surgery,
review:
Hi everyone,

Iam so happy with the braces treatment I had undergone during my time as the doctor aarathi is so friendly and comfortable and a genuine doctor whom I have met so far, coming to the treatment she explained me everything and the pros and cons ofcourse which any dentist will be letting us know but she is the one who makes sure whether the patient is comfortable or not and then only start the treatment.
I went to her for my braces treatment and I came to know there are so many other issues which we need to overcome at first, and I was scared as I haven't been to any treatment till this time which I went and it's only because of the doctor who made me comfortable....
So going back to my treatment firstly I was scared how this end up but slowly I came to know that it is fine with doctors advice.
My only regret is that as it my last phase of treatment and unfortunately my location has changed due to some reasons and I can't able to continue with my doctors treatment...
Anyways I am keen observer who is observing her past one year and she is one of the good and kind and genuine doctors I have met....so to add a little happiness and the strength to whoever may come across this review I recommend doctor aarthi to you guys and even Dr Shiva Prasad...(orthodontist).
Thank you doctors for the good treatment you are providing üôè‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è

With lots of respect your patient:
Nalini
reply_text: Thanks a lot Mrs Nalini for your valuable feedback .Happy and really glad we were able to help and thank u for your kind words .Do visit us some time ma'am !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was very good experience . first of all
I would like to give a lots of thanks to Aarathi mam giving such a good treatment 
So that  now i can feel good . Mam is very friendly , giving more than sufficient time 
To patient and listen them carefully . She 
Always take care about her patient . After
Treatment if u want to ask any suggestion regarding your problum u can ask and will get immediate 
Response .  Before coming i used to scared from dental doctor . But now i can say NO 
NEED to afraid from dental doctor .  The facilities is also good . As a dental clinic prealy is very good . I would like to sugges my all friends that if you want to get treatment please go to this clinic

Thank u mam for such a good job .
reply_text:
Hi Mr.Rajranjan,
         Thank u so much for your feedback .It really drives us to do more .Glad could be of your assistance in the time of your need .All the best .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Well I guess me and Dr. Aarthi along with Dr.Kaushik all of us had a roller coster ride during my 74 yrs old father's treatment but both doctors advised,treated and gave ample support and time to treat my father. I called both doctors at odd hours and they given advise over phone and at times they cancelled their fixed appointments to see and treat my father.I would give advise those are seeking treatment for their aged patients that they must be clear in their mind about treatments,its approach , recovery time and any consequences which may come on your way,i mean one shouldn't have a any sort of confusion. I am saying it from my experience.
